Meeting at TU Berlin with Guest Lecture Pamela Jordan & Opportunity to go to BOL
Pamela Jordan (University of Amsterdam, School for Heritage, Memory, and Material Culture) will talk about design opportunities from the persepetive of an architect.
After the guest lecture it is planned to offer the opportunity to go to the BOL, in case you want to work on your audio recordings.
